name: 'Satya' Social School and Work/ Research Academy for Action and Protection of Truth and Yearning for its Anticipation
briefDescription: SATYA an NGO is a non-profit voluntary organization. SATYA been active since 2001 and formally registered in 2004, under the Rajasthan Societies Registration Act, 1958. SATYA’s new leadership has gradually moved away from the “money-making growth at any price” strategy of the past and toward new- fangled “democratic system”. This shift has been accompanied by substantial efforts to grapple with Poverty, MMR, IMR, Dignity of the Girl Child, Primary Education, Women Empowerment, Urbanization, Rural Migration, HIV/AIDS, Surrogacy, Human Rights, Solid waste management, Water resources management and Natural resources management etc. and address serious economic and governance issues like capacity building of PRIs. At SATYA, women are benefiting
